alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 1:33PM PDT until March 22 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the lower half elevations of the mountains and 12 to 18 inches in the higher half. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
